name: RGB: Reincarnating Gunner Block
description:
RGB: Reincarnating Gunner Block is a game made for Mini Jam 111: Colors

You can check out the full project here: https://github.com/saix93/MiniJam111-Colors

You are a Reincarnating Gunner Block, RGB for short, and every 5 seconds, your color changes, you have to shoot at the enemies when your color matches with them to destroy them.

When an enemy kills you, they will absorb your powers and become the new you!

WASD/Left stick - Move

Mouse/Right stick - Aim

Left click/Spacebar/Right trigger - Shoot

Crosshair from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/crosshair-pack

Icons from https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/

SFX and Music from https://freesound.org/

Have fun!
